entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near minus 1. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries early this morning. Periods of snow beginning this afternoon. Risk of freezing drizzle early this morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature steady near minus 1. Wind chill near minus 6. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:30 AM EDT Monday 24 April 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 3.
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending near midnight then cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Risk of freezing drizzle overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 3. Wind chill near minus 8. Forecast issued 4:30 AM EDT Monday 24 April 2023
